00020 //----------------------------------------------------------
00021 ThRingBuffer::ThRingBuffer( unsigned int regionSize, unsigned int regionCount, unsigned int alignment )
00022 : _curReadRegion( 0 )
00023 , _curWriteRegion( 0 )
00024 , _regionSize( regionSize )
00025 , _regionCount( regionCount )
00026 , _readSignal( false, false )
00027 , _writeSignal( true, false )
00028 {
00029         _buffer = ( unsigned char* )AlignedAlloc( alignment, regionCount * regionSize );
00030 }
00031 
00032 //----------------------------------------------------------
00033 ThRingBuffer::~ThRingBuffer()
00034 {
00035         AlignedFree( _buffer );
00036 }
00037

00041 //==========================================================

00043 //----------------------------------------------------------
00044 unsigned int
00045 ThRingBuffer::GetCurrentUsage()
00046 {
00048         _guard.Enter();
00049         unsigned int count = _curWriteRegion - _curReadRegion + 1;
00050         _guard.Leave();
00051         return count;
00052 }
00053 
00054 //----------------------------------------------------------
00055 void*
00056 ThRingBuffer::GetWriteRegion( bool wait )
00057 {
00059         if ( wait )
00060                 _writeSignal.Wait();
00061 
00063         unsigned int localRegion = ( _curWriteRegion % _regionCount );
00064         unsigned int localOffset = localRegion * _regionSize;
00065 
00067         return _buffer + localOffset;
00068 }
00069 
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------
00071 const void*
00072 ThRingBuffer::GetReadRegion( bool wait )
00073 {
00075         if ( wait )
00076                 _readSignal.Wait();
00077 
00079         unsigned int localRegion = ( _curReadRegion % _regionCount );
00080         unsigned int localOffset = localRegion * _regionSize;
00081 
00083         return _buffer + localOffset;
00084 }
00085 
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 void*
00088 ThRingBuffer::NextWriteRegion( bool wait )
00089 {
00091         if ( wait )
00092                 _writeSignal.Wait();
00093 
00095         _guard.Enter();
00096 
00098         void* returnValue = 0;
00099         unsigned int usage = _curWriteRegion - _curReadRegion;
00100         if ( usage < _regionCount )
00101         {
00103                 if ( usage == 0 )
00104                         _readSignal.Raise();
00105 
00108                 _curWriteRegion += 1;
00109                 usage += 1;
00110 
00112                 unsigned int localRegion = ( _curReadRegion % _regionCount );
00113                 unsigned int localOffset = localRegion * _regionSize;
00114 
00118                 if ( usage == _regionCount )
00119                         _writeSignal.Lower();
00120                 else
00121                         returnValue = _buffer + localOffset;
00122         }
00123 
00124         _guard.Leave();
00125 
00127         if ( wait && returnValue == 0 )
00128                 returnValue = GetWriteRegion( true );
00129 
00131         return returnValue;
00132 }
00133 
00134 //----------------------------------------------------------
00135 const void*
00136 ThRingBuffer::NextReadRegion( bool wait )
00137 {
00138         _guard.Enter();
00139 
00141         const void* returnValue = 0;
00142         if ( _curReadRegion < _curWriteRegion )
00143         {
00145                 _curReadRegion += 1;
00146 
00148                 unsigned int localRegion = ( _curReadRegion % _regionCount );
00149                 unsigned int localOffset = localRegion * _regionSize;
00150 
00152                 unsigned int usage = _curWriteRegion - _curReadRegion;
00153                 if ( usage < _regionCount )
00154                         _writeSignal.Raise();
00155 
00157                 if ( usage == 0 )
00158                         _readSignal.Lower();
00159                 else
00160                         returnValue = _buffer + localOffset;
00161         }
00162 
00163         _guard.Leave();
00164 
00166         if ( wait && returnValue == 0 )
00167                 returnValue = GetReadRegion( true );
00168 
00170         return returnValue;
00171 }
